content.title: About me
content.content:
Hello.

I am Joseph Briggs a Passioante tech guy that does FrontEnd Web Development amongst other things. 
I love the sea, TV Shows, Blues, Jazz, sports, gaming and amongst other things.

I always had a passion for technology ever since I saw Prince of Persia for the first time (Yeah the first one ever, that game rocked!).

Then I started out trying to figure out how a human could interact with plastic boards and electricity, so I decided to read a book (no internet back then :P) on C, even today I don't get it xD

So when I was about 11 years old I went into PHP (hello mIRC), then...

After watching the first cinematic from Blizzards Warcraft III way back in the day, I started my path towards VFX. I really wanted to find out how on earth I could do that kick ass cinematic. So I did a few courses and went to LA. Did some work finally figured out how they made that kick ass cinematic and more!

After a while I decided I wanted something else, so here I am a mixture of art with dev.


So thats my story :)

If you wish to grab a beer or just talk, throw me an email, or add me on one of the gazillion social network systems out there :P
